detectors.description:
ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#74-82) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#79)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#80)

detectors.description:
PolkaDOT (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#209-270) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#42-44)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#53-55)
	- IERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#18)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#45-47)
	- IERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#15)
	- IERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#20)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#48-52)
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#60-65)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#56-59)
	- IERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#17)
	- IERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#16)
	- IERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#19)
detectors.markdown:

	- [ERC20.allowance(address,address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#L53-L55)

	- [IERC20.totalSupply()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#L15)
	- [IERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#L20)
	- [ERC20.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#L48-L52)
	- [ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#L60-L65)
	- [ERC20.approve(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#L56-L59)
	- [IERC20.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#L17)
	- [IERC20.balanceOf(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#L16)
	- [IERC20.approve(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaDOT.sol#L19)
